Anime Title: NieR:Automata Ver1.1a
Notes: Praises the game's hard-hitting story, profound themes. Later (6:10) praises adaptation's visuals/action but questions adapting game mechanics.

Anime Title: Revenger
Notes: Calls it "dumb bloody fun," notes Urobuchi's involvement, samurai revenge theme.

Anime Title: The Reincarnation of the Strongest Exorcist in Another World (Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai)
Notes: Calls it "AI generated," criticizes generic isekai tropes (OP protag, harem, magic school, slavery).

Anime Title: Vinland Saga Season 2
Notes: Praises MAPPA's adaptation, believes it will do justice to the source material.

Anime Title: Various Sequels (Tokyo Revengers 2, Nagatoro S2, Bungo S4, Shield Hero S?, In/Spectre 2, Danmachi 4 P2)
Notes: Lists the numerous sequels, noting the high quantity this season.

Anime Title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy II
Notes: Hyped for Anos Voldigoad's return, calling him "Giga chad vaulty goat."

Anime Title: Sugar Apple Fairy Tale
Notes: Praises the gorgeous watercolor art style, happy to see more Shojo. Notes the "worker fairy" slavery aspect.

Anime Title: Tomo-chan Is a Girl!
Notes: Excited for the "era of tomboys," calls it cute, compares premise to a "tomboy Nozaki-kun."

Anime Title: Spy Classroom
Notes: Compares to Assassination Classroom but with spies. Questions premise of national security relying on cute girls (like Lycoris Recoil).

Anime Title: The Ice Guy and His Cool Female Colleague
Notes: Focuses on the "two kuuderes like each other" premise, jokes about their slow relationship progress.

Anime Title: Buddy Daddies
Notes: Calls it cute, praises the realistic (sometimes annoying) portrayal of the child Miri, comparing favorably to Anya (Spy x Family).

Anime Title: Trigun Stampede
Notes: Highly excited, nostalgic for original. Praises Studio Orange's 3D animation (dynamic, expressive), sci-fi western setting.

Anime Title: Ningen Fushin: Adventurers Who Don't Believe in Humanity Will Save the World
Notes: Finds the premise (outcasts banding together) and protagonist's name "Nick" amusingly mundane.

Anime Title: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten
Notes: Calls it "way too pure and wholesome," sarcastically disgusted by the innocent relationship dynamic.

Anime Title: Kubo Won't Let Me Be Invisible
Notes: Disappointed it's wholesome rather than fitting the expected "teasing genre" mold like Nagatoro.

Anime Title: ONIMAI: I'm Now Your Sister!
Notes: Praises Studio Bind's animation quality. Notes the "worrying" premise (man -> loli) but hears it's wholesome despite undertones.

Anime Title: High Card
Notes: Calls it "Dopey fun action," likes the card-based power system. Jokes it should be called "Card Captain JoJo."

Anime Title: Giant Beasts of Ars (Ars no Kyojuu)
Notes: Interested as an anime original, compares to Monster Hunter (jokingly Attack on Titan). Keeping an eye on it.

Anime Title: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement
Notes: Likes the concept of isekai for financial reasons ("escaping the IRS"), finds it a fun twist on the genre.

Anime Title: Farming Life in Another World
Notes: Notes it's about actual farming, not action-farming.

Anime Title: Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill
Notes: Finds the "Amazon Prime" skill amusingly overpowered.

Anime Title: Chillin' in My 30s after Getting Fired from the Demon King's Army
Notes: Finds the protagonist relatable due to age and "worthless power."

Anime Title: Endo and Kobayashi Live! The Latest on Tsundere Villainess Lieselotte
Notes: Finds the unique premise (in-game characters hearing player commentary) interesting.

Anime Title: Handyman Saitou in Another World
Notes: Jokes about it being "Lock Picking Lawyer in Another World."

Anime Title: Reborn to Master the Blade: From Hero-King to Extraordinary Squire
Notes: Praises the visual quality, especially the good-looking non-CG dragons, thinks it looks better than expected for the genre.

Anime Title: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady
Notes: His top isekai pick. Praises charming world/characters, energetic protagonist (compares to Chisato), focuses on story over tropes, notes Yuri.
